body: Hello everyone, my name is David and I have been a longtime member on Avicus (I was on before it was called Avicus), I am not always online, but I try to be in my free time. I quit the server a couple months back, but the great community and game-modes drew me back. I want you guys to ask me anything, and I'll answer it to the best of my abilities.

title: AMA and Re-Introducing

replies.body:
I like sports and video games (Not as odd of a combination as you might think).
My favourite holiday is Thanksgiving, which is coming up soon!
I have always loved rap music.

Thank you for being an admin and helping out the server
